trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The ancient deep crow té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the ancient deep crow can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The ancient deep crow makes three attacks: one with its mandibles and two with its claws.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) de dany perforant, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the ancient deep crow can't use its mandibles on another target.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Shadow Caw
entries: The ancient deep crow releases an ear-splitting caw. Each creature within 60 feet of the crow and able to hear it must make a {@dc 17} Constitució saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany psíquic.

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: The deep crow makes a Saviesa (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Shadow Caw (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The ancient deep crow uses Shadow Caw.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The ancient deep crow beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the deep crow must succeed on a {@dc 19} Destresa saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) de dany contundent and be knocked {@condition prone}. The ancient deep crow can then fly up to half its flying speed.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: Auspicia's innate spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència. She pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament requiring no components

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Auspicia makes two attacks.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Ballesta Lleugera
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Brahma is a 4th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Carisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar with spell attacks). She has the following bard spells prepared:

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Brahma has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Taunt (2/Dia)
entries: Brahma can use a bonus action to target one creature she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can hear Brahma, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Carisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of Brahma's next turn.

action.name: War Lute
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Song of Domination (3/Dia)
entries: Brahma targets one creature that can see or hear her, which must succeed on a {@dc 13} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by her for 1 minute. The target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. It has disadvantage on these saves if being {@condition charmed} by Brahma is something the target openly or secretly desires. For 1 hour after the charm effect ends, the target has disadvantage on Intel·ligència, Saviesa, or Carisma checks made as part of a contest with Brahma.

monster.name: Chaos Quadrapod
senses: visió a cegues 120 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The chaos quadrapod té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The chaos quadrapod makes up to two tentacle attacks.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The chaos quadrapod can grapple no more than two targets at a time.

action.name: Chaos Cloud (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The chaos quadrapod shoots forth a knot of roiling ethereal light that explodes at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must succeed on a {@dc 14} Carisma saving throw or be {@condition stunned} fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si clockwork dragon es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un metal statue.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Alè de Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: The clockwork dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must make a {@dc 11} Destresa saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de foc on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The deep crow té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the deep crow can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the deep crow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Saviesa (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The deep crow makes three attacks: one with its mandibles and two with its claws.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany perforant, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the deep crow can't use its mandibles on another target.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany tallant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Donaar is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Carisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar with spell attacks). He has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Champion Challenge (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: As a bonus action, Donaar causes each creature of his choice that he can see within 30 feet of him to make a {@dc 13} Saviesa saving throw. On a failure, a creature can't willingly move more than 30 feet away from Donaar. This effect ends on the creature if Donaar is {@condition incapacitated} or dies, or if the creature is moved more than 30 feet away from him.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Donaar makes two attacks with his greatsword or his whip.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant. Whenever Donaar rolls a 1 or 2 on a damage die, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Acid Vomit
entries: Donaar regurgitates acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 12} Destresa saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany d'àcid on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Flabbergast is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Jim is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Jim carries a wand of wonder. Benign Transportation (Recharges after Jim Casts a Conjuration Spell of 1st Level or Higher). As a bonus action, Jim teleports up to 30 feet to a space he can see. The space must be unoccupied or occupied by a willing Small or Medium creature. If the latter, Jim and the willing creature both teleport, swapping places.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Minor Conjuration
entries: Jim conjures an inanimate object, no larger than 3 feet on a side and no more than 10 pounds, in his hand or on the ground in an unoccupied space he can see within 10 feet of him. The object is visibly magical, radiating dim light out to 5 feet. It disappears if it takes any damage, after 1 hour, or when Jim uses this feature again.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de K'thriss és Carisma ({@dc ([0-9]+)} per salvar conjur). He pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: K'thriss is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Carisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} a impactar with spell attacks). He regains his expended spell slots when he finishes a short or long rest, and knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: K'thriss wears a robe of stars (accounted for in his statistics). The robe allows him to cast the following spells: 6/day: magic missile (7 missiles)

trait.name: Awakened Mind
entries: K'thriss can telepathically speak to any creature he can see within 30 feet of him, provided the creature can understand at least one language.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: K'thriss has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep. Sensible al Sol. While in sunlight, K'thriss has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Saviesa (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: K'thriss makes two attacks with his sickle.

action.name: Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Customizable Storage
entries: A keg robot can hold up to three types of liquid payload totaling 12 gallons within its hollow, barrel-shaped body. A full keg robot can make one liquid attack per gallon before the liquid must be refilled. Filling a keg robot takes 2 rounds per gallon. Differing payloads can alter the keg robot's attacks from those presented here.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Acid Squirt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 20/40 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Beer Shower
entries: The keg robot spews an unnaturally potent beer in a 15-foot cone or in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, a creature has its speed halved by exposure to the potent brew. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
Additionally, the beer shower extinguishes any fires or open flames in its area.

action.name: Hot Oil Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The keg robot sprays hot oil in a 15-foot cone or in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 13} Destresa saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany de foc and falls {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and doesn't fall {@condition prone}.
Any creature affected by the hot oil spray that takes fire damage before the oil dries (after 1 minute) takes an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc, and the oil burns away.

If the oil that remains in the area of the spray is lit, it burns for {@dice 1d4} rounds and deals 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc to any creature that enters the area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Môrgæn's spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència. She pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Môrgæn is a 9th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Saviesa (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar with spell attacks). She has the following ranger spells prepared:

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Môrgæn has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Môrgæn makes three attacks with her scimitars or her longbow.

action.name: Scimitars
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Oak has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: Oak has advantage on Saviesa (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Oak makes three attacks with his hooked daggers or his hand crossbow.

action.name: Hooked Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Return the Favor (3/Dia)
entries: When Oak takes damage from a melee weapon attack, he can make a hooked dagger attack.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Omin is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Saviesa (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Divine Strike
entries: Once on each of his turns when he hits a creature with a weapon attack, Omin can cause the attack to deal an extra 4 ({@dice 1d8}) damage of the same type dealt by the weapon.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Omin has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Omin makes two attacks with his maul.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

reaction.name: War God's Blessing (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of Omin makes an attack roll, but before learning whether it hits or misses, Omin can grant the creature a +10 bonus to that roll.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Pendragon is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Echo Spell (1/Dia)
entries: Pendragon can cast the spell he cast on his last turn, whose casting time becomes 1 bonus action. This bonus casting uses a spell slot as normal.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Phoenix is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Saviesa (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Divine Display (1/Dia)
entries: As a bonus action, Phoenix causes his shield to flare with divine light. Each creature of his choice within 30 feet of him must succeed on a {@dc 13} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Phoenix fa dos atacs armats melé.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Força amb {@dc 12} o be pushed 5 feet.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Portentia deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Portentia that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Portentia doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Portentia makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: Portentia magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than her own, or back into her true form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (her choice). In a new form, Portentia retains her game statistics and ability to speak, but her AC, movement modes, Força, Destresa, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and she gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that she lacks.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Prophetess is a 5th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Saviesa (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar with spell attacks). Prophetess has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Divine Eminence
entries: As a bonus action, Prophetess can expend a spell slot to cause her melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany radiant to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Prophetess expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Prophetess has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de Rosie és Saviesa ({@dc ([0-9]+)} per salvar conjur). She pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Brave
entries: Rosie has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: Rosie can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than hers.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Rosie is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Destresa saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails. She can't use this trait if she's {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Shadow Step
entries: When Rosie is in dim light or darkness, she can use a bonus action to teleport 60 feet to an unoccupied space she can see that is also in dim light or darkness. She then has advantage on the first melee attack she makes before the end of the turn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Rosie makes three attacks, then makes two unarmed strike attacks.

action.name: Staff of the Master (+1 Quarterstaff)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany contundent, o 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent. Rosie's unarmed strikes are magical.

reaction.name: Deflect Missiles
entries: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, Rosie deflects the missile. The damage she takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10 + 9}. If the damage is reduced to 0, she catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and she has a hand free.

trait.name: Defensive Advantage
entries: As long as two or more of Splugoth's allies are within 5 feet of him and are not {@condition incapacitated}, attack rolls against him are made with disadvantage.

trait.name: Fugida Veloç
entries: L'Splugoth pot Destrabar-se o Amagar-se com a acció bonus a torn seu.

trait.name: Touch of Madness
entries: Splugoth has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Splugoth makes two attacks with his dagger.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Word From Beyond (1/Dia)
entries: Splugoth remembers and repeats aloud a few words from a place he entered while walking back from the next world to this one. Each creature of his choice within 30 feet of him that can hear him must succeed on a {@dc 12} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition stunned} fins el final del seu proper torn.

reaction.name: Absorb Attack
entries: When a creature Splugoth can see hits him with a melee weapon attack, the weapon snags on a pocket of residual resurrectional energy and is caught fast. The attack is negated and the weapon cannot be used until the creature succeeds on a {@dc 12} Força (Athletics) check as an action to pull it out of Splugoth. Natural weapons can have their attacks negated by this feature, but can then be retracted automatically at the end of the attacking creature's turn.

from: {@item +1 Armadura de Cuir Tatxonada||+1 cuir tatxonat}
{@item +1 Armadura de Cuir Tatxonada||+1 cuir tatxonat}

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Viari is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Destresa saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Second-Story Work
entries: Climbing does not cost Viari extra movement. Additionally, when he makes a running jump, the distance he covers increases by 5 feet.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Viari deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Viari that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Viari doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Viari makes two attacks with his shortsword and two attacks with his rapier.

action.name: +1 Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: Viari halves the damage that he takes from an attack that hits him. He must be able to see the attacker.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Walnut is a 7th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Saviesa (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} a impactar with spell attacks). She has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Walnut has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Mask of the Wild
entries: Walnut can attempt to hide even when she is only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

trait.name: Wild Shape (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: As a bonus action, Walnut can assume the shape of a dire wolf. She can stay in this form for 3 hours or until she reverts to her normal form as a bonus action. She automatically reverts if she falls {@condition unconscious}, drops to 0 hit points, or dies.
While transformed, Walnut's game statistics are replaced by the statistics of the dire wolf, except she retains her alignment, personality, and Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma scores.
Her attacks in beast form are magical. While in beast form, Walnut can use a bonus action to expend one spell slot and regain {@dice 1d8} hit points per level of the spell slot expended.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Walnut makes two attacks with Foremother or her longbow.

action.name: Foremother (+1 Scimitar)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.
